feedback_text: I really enjoy working with my team. The collaboration is excellent and management is supportive.
The workload has been overwhelming lately. I feel burnt out and need more support.
Great company culture! The benefits are fantastic and I feel valued here.
The communication from leadership could be improved. Sometimes we're left in the dark.
Love the flexibility with remote work. Work-life balance is perfect.
Salary increases haven't kept pace with inflation. Feeling undervalued financially.
The new project management tools have made our work much more efficient. Great decision!
Too many meetings are cutting into productive coding time. Need better focus time.
The training opportunities here are amazing. I've grown so much professionally.
Office environment is noisy and distracting. Hard to focus on important calls.
